blocks.name: clpad
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the ` leftpad ` function.

blocks.name: df-lpad
blocks.content: Define the ` leftpad ` function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: lpadval
blocks.content: Value of the ` leftpad ` function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm lpadval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2), co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, co(c0, clpad, c1), c2, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), cn0, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), universe, w0)
  ovmpt2d(hs1, hs2, c0, clpad, c1, cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1)), universe, universe, cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, cv(hs2)))), csn(cv(hs1))), cconcat, cv(hs2))), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(clpad, cmpo(hs1, hs2, universe, universe, cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, cv(hs2)))), csn(cv(hs1))), cconcat, cv(hs2))))))
  df-lpad(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  mpteq2dv(hs0, cn0, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, cv(hs2)))), csn(cv(hs1))), cconcat, cv(hs2)), co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))))
  oveq12d(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, cv(hs2)))), csn(cv(hs1))), cconcat, cv(hs2), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), c1, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))))
  xpeq12d(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, cv(hs2)))), csn(cv(hs1)), co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, cv(hs2))), co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))))
  oveq2d(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, cv(hs2)), cfv(chash, c1), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))))
  fveq2d(chash, cv(hs2), c1, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))))
  sneqd(cv(hs1), c0, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))))
  simprl(w0, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))
  simprr(w0, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))
  elexd(c0, c3, w0)
  elexd(c1, cword(c3), w0)
  mptexd(hs0, cn0, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cn0, universe))
  nn0ex()
  oveq1d(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  xpeq1d(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0), co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  oveq1d(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1), c2, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  ovexd(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lpadval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[leftpad]c1)` c2)=(((0[..^](c2[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 })[++]c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Word(c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, (c0[leftpad]c1), c2, (((0[..^](c2[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 })[++]c1), cn0, (((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 })[++]c1), universe, w0)
  ovmpt2d(hs1, hs2, c0, clpad, c1, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶(((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 })[++]c1)), universe, universe, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶(((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` hs2)))√ó { hs1 })[++]hs2)), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, leftpad =(hs1 ‚àà ùïå, hs2 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶(((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` hs2)))√ó { hs1 })[++]hs2))))
  df-lpad(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  mpteq2dv(hs0, cn0, (((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` hs2)))√ó { hs1 })[++]hs2), (((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 })[++]c1), (w0 ‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c1)))
  oveq12d(((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` hs2)))√ó { hs1 }), cconcat, hs2, ((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 }), c1, (w0 ‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c1)))
  xpeq12d((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` hs2))), { hs1 }, (0[..^](hs0[-](# ` c1))), { c0 }, (w0 ‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c1)))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, (hs0[-](# ` hs2)), (hs0[-](# ` c1)), (w0 ‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c1)))
  oveq2d(hs0, cmin, (# ` hs2), (# ` c1), (w0 ‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c1)))
  fveq2d(chash, hs2, c1, (w0 ‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c1)))
  sneqd(hs1, c0, (w0 ‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c1)))
  simprl(w0, hs1 = c0, hs2 = c1)
  simprr(w0, hs1 = c0, hs2 = c1)
  elexd(c0, c3, w0)
  elexd(c1, Word(c3), w0)
  mptexd(hs0, cn0, (((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 })[++]c1), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, ‚Ñï0 ‚àà ùïå)
  nn0ex()
  oveq1d(((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 }), cconcat, c1, ((0[..^](c2[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 }), (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2))
  xpeq1d((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` c1))), { c0 }, (0[..^](c2[-](# ` c1))), (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, (hs0[-](# ` c1)), (c2[-](# ` c1)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2))
  oveq1d(hs0, cmin, (# ` c1), c2, (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2))
  simpr(w0, hs0 = c2)
  ovexd(((0[..^](c2[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 }), cconcat, c1, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((((0[..^](c2[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 })[++]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶(((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 })[++]c1)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶(((0[..^](hs0[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 })[++]c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c1)))
}

blocks.name: lpadlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for the ` leftpad ` theorems. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: lpadlem3
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ lpadlen1 (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm lpadlem3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c2)), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c2)), emptycls)), wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl6eq(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c2)), emptycls, cxp(emptycls, csn(c2)), w0)
  xpeq1d(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c2), emptycls, w0)
  syl21anc(w0, wceq(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), emptycls), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c0, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))
  nn0zd(cfv(chash, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  lencl(c1, c3)
  nn0zd(c0, w0)
  biimpa(wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cz), wcel(c0, cz)), wbr(c0, cle, cfv(chash, c1)), wceq(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), emptycls))
  fzo0n(cfv(chash, c1), c0)
  0xp(csn(c2))
}

blocks.name: lpadlen1
blocks.content: Length of a left-padded word, in the case the given word ` W ` is shorter than the desired length. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm lpadlen1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2)), cfv(chash, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))
} = {
  fveq2d(chash, cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2), c1, w0)
  3eqtrd(cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2), c1, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), co(emptycls, cconcat, c1), w0)
  lpadval(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  oveq1d(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1, emptycls, w0)
  lpadlem3(c2, c1, c0, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(emptycls, cconcat, c1), c1), wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  ccatlid(c1, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lpadlen1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(# `((c0[leftpad]c1)` c2))=(# ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Word(c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2[‚â§](# ` c1))
} = {
  fveq2d(chash, ((c0[leftpad]c1)` c2), c1, w0)
  3eqtrd(((c0[leftpad]c1)` c2), c1, (((0[..^](c2[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 })[++]c1), (‚àÖ[++]c1), w0)
  lpadval(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  oveq1d(((0[..^](c2[-](# ` c1)))√ó { c0 }), cconcat, c1, emptycls, w0)
  lpadlem3(c2, c1, c0, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (‚àÖ[++]c1)= c1, c1 ‚àà Word(c3))
  ccatlid(c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: lpadlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for the ` leftpad ` theorems. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm lpadlem2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c2))), co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, c0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c2))), co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c2))), co(co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), cmul, nat1), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c2))), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c2)))))
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c2))), co(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c2)))), wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), cfn), wcel(csn(c2), cfn))
  fzofi(nat0, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))
  snfi(c2)
  hashxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c2))
  oveq12d(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))), cmul, cfv(chash, csn(c2)), co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), nat1, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))), co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), cn0))
  hashfzo0(co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c2)), nat1), wcel(c2, c3))
  hashsng(c2, c3)
  mulid1d(co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), w0)
  nn0cnd(co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, c0))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  lencl(c1, c3)
  nn0sub2(cfv(chash, c1), c0)
}

blocks.name: lpadlen2
blocks.content: Length of a left-padded word, in the case the given word ` W ` is shorter than the desired length. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm lpadlen2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, c2))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(chash, cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2)), c2, cfv(chash, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1)), w0)
  fveq2d(chash, cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2), co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), w0)
  lpadval(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  3eqtrd(cfv(chash, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1)), c2, co(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))), caddc, cfv(chash, c1)), co(co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), caddc, cfv(chash, c1)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1)), co(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))), caddc, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cword(c3)), wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  lpadlem1(c2, c1, c0, c3, w0)
  ccatlen(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), c3, c1)
  oveq1d(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))), caddc, cfv(chash, c1), co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), w0)
  lpadlem2(c2, c1, c0, c3, w0)
  npcand(c2, cfv(chash, c1), w0)
  nn0cnd(c2, w0)
  nn0cnd(cfv(chash, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  lencl(c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: lpadmax
blocks.content: Length of a left-padded word, in the general case, expressed with an ` if ` statement. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm lpadmax(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2)), cif(cfv(chash, c1), c2, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
} = {
  ifbothda(cfv(chash, c1), c2, w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2)), cif(cfv(chash, c1), c2, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2)), cfv(chash, c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2)), c2))
  eqeq2(cfv(chash, c1), cif(cfv(chash, c1), c2, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), cfv(chash, cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2)))
  eqeq2(c2, cif(cfv(chash, c1), c2, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), cfv(chash, cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2)))
  lpadlen1(c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)), wcel(c2, cn0))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)), wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)), wcel(c0, c3))
  simpr(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))
  lpadlen2(c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(c0, c3))
  ltled(cfv(chash, c1), c2, wa(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cr))
  nn0red(c2, wa(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(c2, cn0))
  biimpar(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), clt, c2))
  ltnled(cfv(chash, c1), c2, w0)
  nn0red(cfv(chash, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), wcel(c1, cword(c3)))
  lencl(c1, c3)
  nn0red(c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lpadmax(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(# `((c0[leftpad]c1)` c2))= if(c2[‚â§](# ` c1),(# ` c1), c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Word(c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
} = {
  ifbothda((# ` c1), c2, w0, (# `((c0[leftpad]c1)` c2))= if(c2[‚â§](# ` c1),(# ` c1), c2), c2[‚â§](# ` c1), (# `((c0[leftpad]c1)` c2))=(# ` c1), (# `((c0[leftpad]c1)` c2))= c2)
  eqeq2((# ` c1), if(c2[‚â§](# ` c1),(# ` c1), c2), (# `((c0[leftpad]c1)` c2)))
  eqeq2(c2, if(c2[‚â§](# ` c1),(# ` c1), c2), (# `((c0[leftpad]c1)` c2)))
  lpadlen1(c0, c1, c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß c2[‚â§](# ` c1)))
  adantr(w0, c2[‚â§](# ` c1), c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  adantr(w0, c2[‚â§](# ` c1), c1 ‚àà Word(c3))
  adantr(w0, c2[‚â§](# ` c1), c0 ‚àà c3)
  simpr(w0, c2[‚â§](# ` c1))
  lpadlen2(c0, c1, c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c2[‚â§](# ` c1)))
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c2[‚â§](# ` c1), c1 ‚àà Word(c3))
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c2[‚â§](# ` c1), c0 ‚àà c3)
  ltled((# ` c1), c2, (w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c2[‚â§](# ` c1)))
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c2[‚â§](# ` c1), (# ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñù)
  nn0red(c2, (w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c2[‚â§](# ` c1)))
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c2[‚â§](# ` c1), c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  biimpar(w0, ¬¨ c2[‚â§](# ` c1), (# ` c1)[<]c2)
  ltnled((# ` c1), c2, w0)
  nn0red((# ` c1), w0)
  syl(w0, (# ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï0, c1 ‚àà Word(c3))
  lencl(c1, c3)
  nn0red(c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: lpadleft
blocks.content: The contents of prefix of a left-padded word is always the letter ` C ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm lpadleft(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2), c3), c0))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2), c3), c0, cfv(co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), c3), cfv(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), c3), w0)
  fveq1d(cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2), c3, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), w0)
  lpadval(c0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cfv(co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), c3), cfv(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), c3)), wcel(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cword(c4)), wcel(c1, cword(c4)), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))))))
  lpadlem1(c2, c1, c0, c4, w0)
  eleqtrrd(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)))), co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), w0)
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))), co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), w0)
  lpadlem2(c2, c1, c0, c4, w0)
  syl21anc(w0, wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, c2), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), cn0))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), wcel(c1, cword(c4)))
  lencl(c1, c4)
  nnnn0d(co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), w0)
  simp2d(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), cn), wcel(c3, cn0), wbr(c3, clt, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))))
  sylib(w0, w3a(wcel(c3, cn0), wcel(co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), cn), wbr(c3, clt, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))))
  elfzo0(c3, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))
  biimpar(wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), cn0), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, c2))
  nn0sub(cfv(chash, c1), c2)
  ccatval1(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), c4, c1, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), c3), c0), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)))))
  fvconst2g(c0, c4, c3, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))))
}

blocks.name: lpadright
blocks.content: The suffix of a left-padded word the original word ` W ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm lpadright(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2), co(c3, caddc, c4)), cfv(c1, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cword(c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cif(nat0, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1))))
} = {
  3eqtr2d(cfv(cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2), co(c3, caddc, c4)), cfv(c1, c3), cfv(co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), co(c3, caddc, c4)), cfv(co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), co(c3, caddc, cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))))), w0)
  fveq1d(cfv(co(c0, clpad, c1), c2), co(c3, caddc, c4), co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), w0)
  lpadval(c0, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  fveq2d(co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), co(c3, caddc, cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)))), co(c3, caddc, c4), w0)
  oveq2d(c3, caddc, cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))), c4, w0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))), c4, cif(nat0, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), w0)
  ifbothda(nat0, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))), cif(nat0, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))), nat0), wceq(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))), co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))))
  eqeq2(nat0, cif(nat0, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))))
  eqeq2(co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), cif(nat0, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1)), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))))
  syl6eq(cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))), nat0, cfv(chash, emptycls), wa(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))))
  fveq2d(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), emptycls, wa(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))))
  lpadlem3(c2, c1, c0, c5, wa(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)), wcel(c2, cn0))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)), wcel(c1, cword(c5)))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)), wcel(c0, c5))
  simpr(w0, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))
  hash0()
  lpadlem2(c2, c1, c0, c5, wa(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(c2, cn0))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(c1, cword(c5)))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(c0, c5))
  ltled(cfv(chash, c1), c2, wa(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1)))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cr))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), wcel(c2, cr))
  biimpar(w0, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(chash, c1))), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), clt, c2))
  ltnled(cfv(chash, c1), c2, w0)
  nn0red(cfv(chash, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), wcel(c1, cword(c5)))
  lencl(c1, c5)
  nn0red(c2, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cfv(co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cconcat, c1), co(c3, caddc, cfv(chash, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0))))), cfv(c1, c3)), wcel(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), cword(c5)), wcel(c1, cword(c5)), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c1))))
  lpadlem1(c2, c1, c0, c5, w0)
  ccatval3(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c1))), csn(c0)), c5, c1, c3)
}
